snippet: The activist and street protest leader, Aleksei A. Navalny, is already being questioned in two other cases and the new charges became public a day before a planned opposition rally.
abstract: Russian police open new criminal investigation against anticorruption activist and street protest leader Aleksei Navalny, who is already being questioned in two other cases.
lead_paragraph: The activist and street protest leader, Aleksei A. Navalny, is already being questioned in two other cases and the new charges became public a day before a planned opposition rally.

headline.seo: Russian Police Open New Case Against Aleksei Navalny
headline.main: Russia Opens New Inquiry Targeting an Activist
headline.print_headline: Russia Opens New Inquiry Targeting An Activist
